pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe…. 1
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ. 2
